page.title: 13LONDON HOUSE
page.content: . Our village shop is a Spar shop, belonging to te Spar group of independent grocers. There has been a shop on this site for over a hundred years, having been built there when the previous shop in Sunton was burnt down. The present owners are Mr.B. Greening and Mrs. E. Abbot, and they have changed the shop by extending its scope.The shop is basically self service, supplying a wide range of groceries,greengroceries,meat,bread, wines and spirits,stationery and newspapers.In the last year a delicatessen and fresh meat section has been opened.This has been very popular as people do not have to go out of the village for these items. The Post Office is also in London House.
